title: Opening chest animation
body:
Now that I have to deal with Opening stuff, I find The animation way too long. I really don't care for it. I waiting far too long making keys. (now ever sure why I did, have 27 keys and see no need to buy random boxes). My PC just lags as I see all the useless sparkles to get a skin shard of someone I don't care about. Really dislike the loot box system but it didn't affect me so I didn't care till now.

Is there a way to disable the animations? Save me a lot of frustration.

replies.body: Try turning on the low-spec mode in the client settings. That will remove some of the visual flairs that make the client 'pretty' so it should run a bit smoother for you.
